response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $12,000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend a special offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for an exclusive price of $10,800. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant savings of $1,200 compared to the standard price. Please let me know if you are interested in seizing this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10800}
